title: DRCSIM: Hand torque sensor - no X output

content.raw:
[Posted by Alberto Romay](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/2651/drcsim-hand-torque-sensor-no-x-output/)

The X component from the torque sensor of the hand is buggy. Z and Y components of the torque sensor in the wrist are giving an output while X is not. Discovered that only when the joint limits from the r_arm_mwx joint are reach the X starts giving an output.

[Hand torque sensor 1](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qwFaM3c1TJM) shows how the Z component is performing well, while the X is giving an output only when it reaches the joint limit (2:40).

[Hand torque sensor 2](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DMcgStZbhTs) shows how the X component gives output only in the joint limits (upper 0:31 and lower 3:20).
